body_text:
Which Akame ga KILL! manga should I read if I want to continue the storyline of the anime? I saw there are various manga with Akame ga KILL! in their names.
The ones I have found are:

Akame ga KILL!
Akame ga KILL! Zero

Which one should I read if I want to continue the storyline of the anime?

Does the Akame Ga Kill! manga continue where the anime leaves off? The anime has ended at episode 24, "Akame ga Kill!".
Does the manga continue the story beyond the anime's conclusion?
